description: A square temple in a temenos located behind the the theatre in Verulamium Roman town. Lewis (1966) suggest a chronology beginning around the year 90 and and end date in the mid 5th CE after several phases of rebuilding and additions.
bibliography: Frere, S. S. “Excavations at Verulamium 1959. Fifth Interim Report.” Antiquaries Journal 40 (1960): 12 ff.
Lowther, A. W. G. “Report on Excavations at Verulamium in 1934.” Antiquaries Journal 17 (1937): 28 ff.
Wheeler, R. E. M., and T. V. Wheeler. In Verulamium, A Belgic and Two Roman Cities, 113 ff, 1936.
